entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
